languages.text: "Утверждение истинно. Остались лишь Фантазия и Суждение. Наша директива — концептуализировать желаемое будущее и свершить его".
"This statement is true. Only Imagination and Judgement are left. Our directive is to conceptualise the future we desire and bring it into being."
languages.original_text: "Утверждение истинно. Остались лишь Фантазия и Суждение. Наша директива — концептуализировать желаемое будущее и свершить его".

traits.locale_text: "This statement is true. Only Imagination and Judgement are left. Our directive is to conceptualise the future we desire, and bring it about."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This statement is true. Only Imagination and Judgement are left. Our directive is to conceptualise the future we desire, and bring it about."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This statement is true. Only Imagination and Judgement are left. Our directive is to conceptualise the future we desire and bring it to be."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This statement is true. Only Imagination and Judgement are left. Our directive is to conceptualise the future we desire and bring it to be."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This statement is true. Only Imagination and Judgement are left. Our directive is to conceptualise the future we desire and bring it into being."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This statement is true. Only Imagination and Judgement are left. Our directive is to conceptualise the future we desire and bring it into being."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「その発言は正しい。想像と審判だけが残った。我々の指示が、望む未来を概念化し、実存のものとさせるのだ」
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Only Imagination and Judgement are left. Our directive is to conceptualise the future we desire and bring it into being."

traits.locale_text: 「その発言は正しい。想像と審判だけが残った。我々の指示が、望む未来を概念化し、実存のものとさせるのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这种说法是正确的。如今只剩下想象和判断，我们的目标就是将我们想要的未来化为概念，将其实现。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Only Imagination and Judgement are left. Our directive is to conceptualise the future we desire and bring it into being."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是正确的。如今只剩下想象和判断，我们的目标就是将我们想要的未来化为概念，将其实现。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. Il ne reste que l'imagination et le jugement. Nous avons pour directive de conceptualiser l'avenir que nous désirons et d'en faire une réalité. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Only Imagination and Judgement are left. Our directive is to conceptualise the future we desire and bring it into being."

traits.locale_text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. Il ne reste que l'imagination et le jugement. Nous avons pour directive de conceptualiser l'avenir que nous désirons et d'en faire une réalité. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Esta declaración es verdadera. Solo quedan la Imaginación y el Juicio. Nuestro cometido es prever el futuro que deseamos y hacer que suceda».
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Only Imagination and Judgement are left. Our directive is to conceptualise the future we desire and bring it into being."

traits.locale_text: «Esta declaración es verdadera. Solo quedan la Imaginación y el Juicio. Nuestro cometido es prever el futuro que deseamos y hacer que suceda».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Nur Vorstellungskraft und Urteil sind noch übrig. Unsere Direktive lautet, die von uns begehrte Zukunft zu konzeptualisieren und herbeizuführen."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Only Imagination and Judgement are left. Our directive is to conceptualise the future we desire and bring it into being."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Nur Vorstellungskraft und Urteil sind noch übrig. Unsere Direktive lautet, die von uns begehrte Zukunft zu konzeptualisieren und herbeizuführen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bu önerme doğru. Yalnızca Hayal Gücü ve Hüküm kaldı. Talimatımız, arzuladığımız geleceği kafamızda canlandırıp var etmek."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Only Imagination and Judgement are left. Our directive is to conceptualise the future we desire and bring it into being."

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme doğru. Yalnızca Hayal Gücü ve Hüküm kaldı. Talimatımız, arzuladığımız geleceği tasarım hâline getirmek ve var etmek."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
